import React from 'react' import Umbrela from '../../../assets/img/home/umbrela.png' import {gsap} from 'gsap' import {ScrollTrigger} from 'gsap/ScrollTrigger' import {useLayoutEffect} from 'react' function Item1() { useLayoutEffect(() => { gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger); gsap.to('.guarda-chuva', { x: -700, opacity: 0, }) return () => { gsap.to('.guarda-chuva', { x: 0, opacity: 1, }) } }, []) return (
